mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.email, t.phone, t.user_name, t.user_display_name, t.user_pass, t.id_card, t.user_avatar, t.user_desc, t.status, t.money, t.create_time FROM user_role_ref r, user t WHERE r.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.user_id = t.id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t.id DESC

SELECT t.id, t.email, t.phone, t.user_name, t.user_display_name, t.user_pass, t.id_card, t.user_avatar, t.user_desc, t.status, t.money, t.create_time FROM user_role_ref r, user t WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 AND r.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.user_id = t.id
AND t.status = #{user.status}
AND t.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userName}, '%')
AND t.user_display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userDisplayName}, '%')
AND t.id_card LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.idCard}, '%')
ORDER BY t.id DESC

SELECT t.id, t.user_name, t.email, t.phone, t.user_display_name, t.user_pass, t.id_card, t.user_avatar, t.user_desc, t.status, t.money, t.create_time FROM user t WHERE t.del_flag = 0
AND t.status = #{user.status}
AND t.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userName}, '%')
AND t.user_display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userDisplayName}, '%')
AND t.id_card LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.idCard}, '%')
ORDER BY t.id DESC
SELECT count( * ) FROM post WHERE to_days( create_time ) = to_days( now( ) ) AND del_flag = 0

SELECT count( * ) postCount, u.id, u.user_name, u.user_avatar, u.user_display_name, u.create_time FROM post p, user u WHERE p.user_id = u.id AND p.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY p.user_id ORDER BY postCount DESC LIMIT #{value}
SELECT id, user_name, user_avatar, user_display_name, create_time FROM user WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{value}
SELECT u.id, u.user_name, u.user_avatar, u.user_display_name, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM post p WHERE p.user_id = u.id ) postCount FROM USER u ORDER BY postCount DESC
